arts.ttl: Mark Robins has simple message after Stoke City seal huge win at Cardiff
arts.sum: Stoke are now five points above third-bottom Cardiff with four games to play, or as good as six with goal difference, and there are three other teams between them and the relegation zone too. Mark Robins' simple message after a potentially pivotal win for Stoke City at Cardiff was to enjoy it - at least before the pressure of the final four games to make sure they get safety over the line.

arts.ttl: Stoke City player ratings vs Cardiff as away end goes bananas
arts.sum: An own goal from Will Fish in the 85th minute after a Junior Tchamadeu long throw had sparked chaos in the Cardiff penalty area was the moment that proved the difference between two sides who are fighting for their lives at the bottom. Manhoef was at centre of chances in the second half but a 65-yard run ended in a poor shot and he fluffed his pass to Lewis Koumas in a golden moment when he had been gifted the ball on the half-way line.

arts.ttl: Will Fish’s own goal earns Stoke the points against fellow strugglers Cardiff
arts.sum: Stoke moved five points clear of their hosts who are in the third relegation spot.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City 0-1 Stoke City: Bluebirds' Championship status hanging by a thread after disastrous defeat
arts.sum: Cardiff, not for the first time this season, looked ordinary for long period of this contest, and the visitors duly took advantage as Ben Wilmot’s late effort was palmed by Ethan Horvath straight off Fish and into the net. Million Manhoef similarly spurned several decent chances, after the break, while substitute Isaak Davies should have scored just before Stoke’s decisive opener, somehow conspiring to scoop his effort over from close range with the goal at his mercy.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City v Stoke City halted as players leave pitch and medics rush to emergency
arts.sum: There were concerning scenes at the Cardiff City Stadium as the match between Cardiff and Stoke was halted due to a medical emergency in the stands

arts.ttl: Cardiff vs Stoke City SUSPENDED as medical emergency halts Championship match
arts.sum: Cardiff City vs Stoke City was paused after 35 minutes, with the score at 0-0, after a home supporter required urgent medical attention at the Cardiff City Stadium

arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Cardiff team news as Mark Robins makes one change
arts.sum: “It’s a game of football, not a life or death situation that a lot of people are going through at this moment in time. “The fact we’ve got players available and fit is a must, really, in this period but I’ve said before, as a collective: go out and enjoy it.

arts.ttl: Cardiff vs Stoke City live - Team news from huge game in fight for survival - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: Mark Robins is not expected to make many changes as Stoke City head to Cardiff for the next big game in a finale full of potentially pivotal fixtures. Still, they have both been told to be ready for when they will be called upon in the last five games, along with the other players who have spent recent weeks watching from the stands.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City v Stoke City LIVE: Kick-off time, team news and score updates
arts.sum: Follow live updates from the Cardiff City Stadium as City take on Stoke

arts.ttl: Stoke City boss makes loan stance clear as Tottenham Hotspur defender holds fort
arts.sum: Stoke have relied heavily on loanees this season and Ashley Phillips, Andrew Moran and Lewis Koumas have all been main stays in the match day squad. Tom Cannon (Leicester City), aged 22, 22 (0) appearances, 1,863 minutes, nine goals, one assist
